Larry Page praised Eric Schmidt , too. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, Larry Page said.`` Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him.'' California Treasurer Bill Lockyer told Reuters Insider on Monday that states may not need the same freedom to declare bankruptcy as major companies because they have a guaranteed source of revenue. The major difference, of course, is that we're looking at sovereign governments that have the ability to enact a tax, and that's not the case of these private corporations that may have unfunded obligations that they can't deal with, he said.
